resources.string: The NFC-based login is deactivated, since the NFC function was disabled
Your NFC tag has been read

Welcome in the app for your workplace's contactless lock system. Since you started this app for the first time, this setup guide will lead you through the setup process. Please hold your login information and your chipcard steady.
You can choose between two setup modes:
1. Automatic Setup
2. Manual Setup
In the automatic setup you just scan a QR Code, generated at the Webconfig, and the configuration is done for you. In contary the manual setup needs all information enterd by hand.

Since you selected the manual configuration, you need to enter the address of your server.\nPlease note, the address needs to begin with either \'http://\' or \'https://\'.\nIf you do not have this information, please contact your administrator.
This type of code is not supported
Server address is valid and reachable
The server address is vaild, but the server is not reachable by a Ping
Please enter the Port for the webinterface.\nThe standard port is 80. If the server connection is secured via SSL and the certificate is valid use port 443
